attributes.action: Extended the international driving license for critical workers
attributes.additional_details: Working as critical worker especially in Health sector the car is extremely important as part of daily basis .thus if we can’t drive our car due to expired of our international driving license we can’t arrive to our hospitals
attributes.background: Due to COVID-19 status no slots for practical driving test since March and using a car is considered as part of our job , thus we  want the DVLA to extend the validity of using international driving license for 6 months
